event.descr: The native VLAN on %parm[aIfDescr]% is set to %parm[aVlan]% which does not match %parm[zVlan]% on %parm[zHostname]% %parm[zIfDescr]%.
The duplex %parm[aIfDescr]% is set to %parm[aDuplex]% which does not match %parm[zDuplex]% on %parm[zHostname]% %parm[zIfDescr]%.
The node: %nodelabel% has indicated that the interface: %parm[ifDescr]% has transistioned from an "Up" state to a "Down" state via a Syslog message.
The node: %nodelabel% has indicated that the interface: %parm[ifDescr]% has transistioned from a "Down" state to an "Up" state via a Syslog message.
The line protocol on %parm[ifDescr]% is down.
The line protocol on %parm[ifDescr]% is up.
The HSRP state changed from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]% on %parm[param1]% %parm[param2]%.
event.logmsg: HSRP state changed from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]% on %parm[param1]% %parm[param2]%

event.descr: Configuration committed by user %parm[configuredBy]%. Use 'show configuration commit changes %parm[configChangeId]%' to view the changes.
The HSRP state changed from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]% on VLAN %parm[vlanId]% and group %parm[groupId]%.
event.logmsg: HSRP state changed from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]% on VLAN %parm[vlanId]% and group %parm[groupId]%

event.descr: Interface %parm[ifDescr]% is active as part of %parm[bundle]%
event.logmsg: Interface %parm[ifDescr]% is active as part of %parm[bundle]%

event.descr: The BFD session to neighbor %parm[neighbor]% on interface %parm[ifDescr]% has gone down. Reason: %parm[reason]%.
The BFD session to neighbor %parm[neighbor]% on interface %parm[ifDescr]% is up.
event.logmsg: BFD session to neighbor %parm[neighbor]% on interface %parm[ifDescr]% is up

event.descr: The BFD session on link %parm[ifDescr]% in %parm[bundleDescr]% has gone up
event.logmsg: BFD session on link %parm[ifDescr]% in %parm[bundleDescr]% has gone up

event.descr: The BFD session to neighbor %parm[neighbor]% on interface %parm[interface]% has gone down. Reason: %parm[reason]%.
The Line protocol on Interface %parm[interface]%, changed state to %parm[status]%.
event.logmsg: Line protocol on Interface %parm[interface]%, changed state to %parm[status]%

event.descr: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% of Fex %parm[fexNumber]% that is connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed its status from %parm[prevStatus]% to %parm[newStatus]%.
event.logmsg: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% of Fex %parm[fexNumber]% that is connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed its status from %parm[prevStatus]% to %parm[newStatus]%

event.descr: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% of Fex %parm[fexNumber]% that is connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed its status from %parm[prevStatus]% to Active.
event.logmsg: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% of Fex %parm[fexNumber]% that is connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed its status from %parm[prevStatus]% to Active

event.descr: Process %parm[process]%, Nbr %parm[neighbor]% on %parm[interface]% in area %parm[area]% from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%, Loading Done, vrf %parm[vrfName]%.
event.logmsg: Process %parm[process]%, Nbr %parm[neighbor]% on %parm[interface]% in area %parm[area]% from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%, Loading Done, vrf %parm[vrfName]%

event.descr: Boot Request received from %parm[module]% - RomMon Version: %parm[version]%.
Interface %parm[ifDescr]% is up in mode access.
event.logmsg: Interface %parm[ifDescr]% is up in mode access

event.descr: Process %parm[processId], Neighbor %parm[neighbor]% on %parm[ifDescr]% transitioned from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%. Neighbor Down for reason: %parm[reason]%.
event.logmsg: Process %parm[processId]%, Nbr %parm[neighbor]% on %parm[ifDescr]% from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%, Neighbor Down: %parm[reason]%

event.descr: Card inserted in slot %parm[slot]%, interfaces are now online.
event.logmsg: Card inserted in slot %parm[slot]%, interfaces are now online

event.descr: Reload requested by %parm[user]% on %parm[tty]% %parm[host]%. Reload Reason: %parm[reason]%.
event.logmsg: Reload requested by %parm[user]% on %parm[tty]% %parm[host]%. Reload Reason: %parm[reason]%

event.descr: The PEM in slot %parm[slot]% is switched off or encountering a failure condition.
event.logmsg: The PEM in slot %parm[slot]% is off

event.descr: The BGP neighbor %parm[bgpPeer]% changed state to %parm[state]% with VRF %parm[bgpVrf]% and AS %parm[as]%.
event.logmsg: Neighbor %parm[bgpPeer]% state changed to %parm[state]% for VRF %parm[bgpVrf]% and AS %parm[as]%

event.descr: The BFD session on %parm[ifDescr]% in %parm[bundle]% is starting.
The EIGRP neighbor %parm[neighbor]% interface %parm[ifDescr]% is %parm[state]% due to %parm[reason]%.
event.logmsg: EIGRP neighbor %parm[neighbor]% interface %parm[ifDescr]% is %parm[state]% due to %parm[reason]%

event.descr: Fex %parm[fexNumber]% power supply %parm[powerSupplyId]% with serial number %parm[serialNumber]% has been removed.
Fex %parm[fexNumber]% power supply %parm[powerSupplyId]% with serial number %parm[serialNumber]% has been found.
MEP with mpid %parm[mpid]%, name %parm[name]% and domain %parm[domain]% is up.
The MEP with mpid %parm[mpid]% has entered defect condition.
The MEP with mpid %parm[mpid]% has exited defect condition.
The MEP with mpid %parm[mpid]%, name %parm[name]% and domain %parm[domain]% has gone down.
%parm[moduleType]% module has been inserted with interface name %parm[ifDescr]%.
Interface %parm[ifDescr]% entered AIS defect condition for %parm[direction]% direction.
event.logmsg: %parm[ifDescr]% entered AIS defect condition for %parm[direction]% direction

event.descr: Interface %parm[ifDescr]% exited AIS defect condition for %parm[direction]% direction.
event.logmsg: %parm[ifDescr]% exited AIS defect condition for %parm[direction]% direction

event.descr: Clear block option is %parm[status]% for the fabric in slot %parm[slot]%.
event.logmsg: Clear block option %parm[status]% for fabric in slot %parm[slot]%

event.descr: Core for process %parm[process]% at harddisk:%parm[harddisk]% on local_node.
event.logmsg: Core for process %parm[process]% at harddisk:%parm[harddisk]% on local_node

event.descr: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% of Fex %parm[fexNumber]% that is connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed its status from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%.
event.logmsg: Uplink-ID %parm[uplinkId]% Fex %parm[fexNumber]% connected with %parm[ifDescr]% changed state from %parm[prevState]% to %parm[newState]%

event.descr: SPA in bay %parm[bay]% of type %parm[type]% is %parm[status]%.
Failed authentication attempt by user '%parm[user]%' from %parm[host]%.
event.logmsg: Failed authentication attempt by user '%parm[user]%' from %parm[host]%

event.descr: Fan tray RPM warning on slot %parm[slot]%.
event.logmsg: Fan tray RPM warning on slot %parm[slot]%

event.descr: Fan tray RPM warning cleared on slot %parm[slot]%.
event.logmsg: Fan tray RPM warning cleared on slot %parm[slot]%

event.descr: Interface %parm[ifDescr]%, link down due to local fault
event.logmsg: Interface %parm[ifDescr]%, link down due to local fault

event.descr: Line protocol on Interface %parm[ifDescr]% changed state to down
event.logmsg: Line protocol on Interface %parm[ifDescr]% changed state to down

event.descr: Line protocol on Interface %parm[ifDescr]% changed state to up
event.logmsg: Line protocol on Interface %parm[ifDescr]% changed state to up
Duplicate IP Address %parm[ipAddress]% found on %parm[ifDescr]% sourced by %parm[sourceMac]%
